QuestData.Title: Down With Captain Zorna!
QuestData.Description: The Horde's forces are poised to break through our lines and complete their conquest of Venture Bay if we do not act. The Horde's forces in the port are commanded by Captain Zorna, near the ship on the far side of the bay.$B$BIf you can defeat her, the Horde's offensive will falter and we can seize the chance to capture the port. Beware, $n, for Zorna is a fierce fighter. It may take several people to defeat her, or if you have access to a repaired shredder, you might try using it to your advantage.
QuestData.LogDescription: Slay Captain Zorna and report to Baron Freeman at Venture Bay.
QuestData.RewardText: Well done, $n! Without their leader, the Horde is weak and disorganized. I will order our men forward.
